comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This photograph is part of the (especially entertaining) Indicommons.org "across the Commons" feature Dam It!

comment.author: 39847844@N05
comment._content: This is just amazing to see what the area looked like back then.  I saw the remains of the dam sometime around 15 years ago for the first time and have been intrigued ever since.  Making a park there can help people, especially children, learn some history.  I got to show my children last fall when the leaves were changing on the way back from the Grand Canyon.  How beautiful.
